title: How long does it take a comic book writer to finish a 22-page comic script? - Quora

response.answer_text: I write full-script (screenplay style), and it takes me approximately three days, but that doesn’t include the time spent “back of house” (plot development, character arcs, etc). I’d say from nothing to finished product, even on a multi-issue story arc, one script takes a total of two weeks for me. Others will be different, but two weeks allows plenty of time to go back and forth with editorial before the artist gets it.
